problem.name: 社區鄰里/工作場所安全
與 社區資源的整合

sign.name: 缺乏存糧/缺乏備餐能力
不安全的地墊/滑動的地毯
不受控/危險的/帶病的動物
不足的/不安全遊戲場或運動場
不足的空間與資源促進健康
正在或被通報遭受暴力
難以理解服務提供者的角色與法規限制
sign.nameEn: unfamiliar with options/procedures for obtaining services

sign.name: 不知如何向服務提供者提出訴求
sign.nameEn: difficulty understanding roles/regulations of service providers

sign.name: 不滿服務
sign.nameEn: unable to communicate concerns to provider

sign.name: 求助管道有限(照顧、服務、物資)
無法使用/擁有不合適的溝通器具/設備
sign.nameEn: unable to use/has inadequate communication devices/equiptment

sign.name: 耗用健康照護提供者當社交
sign.nameEn: uses health care provider for social contact

sign.name: 很少戶外刺激與休閒活動
靈性信仰與醫療/照護衝突
sign.nameEn: conflicting spiritual beliefs and medical/health care regimen

sign.name: fails to recognize stages of grief/process of healing
sign.nameEn: fails to recognize stages of grief/process of healing

sign.name: conflicting stages of grief among individuals/families
sign.nameEn: conflicting stages of grief among individuals/families

sign.name: 對參與活動/自我照顧失去興趣
狹隘導致 分散注意力與焦點
不考慮後果的性行為
sign.nameEn: difficulty recognizing consequences of sexual behavior

sign.name: 難以提供生理照護與安全
難以提供認知學習經驗與活動
sign.nameEn: difficulty providing cognitive learning experiences and activities

sign.name: 難以提供預防保健照護
sign.nameEn: difficulty providing preventive and therapeutic health care

sign.name: 揠苗助長
sign.nameEn: expectations incongruent with stage of growth and development

sign.name: 難有語言非語言之互動或回應
sign.nameEn: difficulty interpreting or responding to verbal/nonverbal communication

sign.name: 缺乏合式的刺激與認知經驗
傷痕與燒傷或其他傷勢
發展檢核量表有異常
sign.nameEn: abnormal results of developmental screening tests

sign.name: 偏離該年齡生長發育平均值(體重/身高/頭圍)
sign.nameEn: abnormal weight/height/head circumference in relation growth/aging standards

sign.name: 與年齡不相符的行為舉止
在吵雜的環境中有障礙
sign.nameEn: difficulty hearing speech in large group settings

sign.name: 聽力篩檢異常
sign.nameEn: abnormal results of hearing screening test

sign.name: 對於視覺刺激沒反應/不正常反應
視力篩檢異常
sign.nameEn: abnormal results of vision screening test

sign.name: 缺乏/異常的談話或演講能力
缺交互溝通的技巧或手勢
定向感有異 時/地/人
長期記憶缺失
sign.nameEn: limited recall of long past events

sign.name: 呼吸生理學相關檢查異常
心臟相關生理檢驗值異常
難或無法咀嚼/吞嚥/消化
更年期停經滴滴答答不適
生殖器與乳房有硬塊腫脹疼痛
sign.nameEn: abnormal lumps/swelling/tenderness of genital organs or breasts

sign.name: 性交疼痛(包含過程與完事後)
sign.nameEn: pain during or after sexual intercourse

sign.name: 難以進行產前運動/休息/飲食/行為
難以進行產後運動/休息/飲食/行為
篩檢/培養/實驗室檢查呈陽性
未遵循感控方案
sign.nameEn: does not follow infection control regimen

sign.name: 過重
sign.nameEn: overweight: adult BMI 25.0 or more; child BMI 95th percentile or more

sign.name: 過輕
sign.nameEn: underweight: adult BMI 18.5 or less; child BMI 5th percentile or less

sign.name: 低於每日飲食準則(液體量/卡洛里)
sign.nameEn: lacks established standards for daily caloric/fluid intake

sign.name: 高過每日飲食準則(液體量/卡洛里)
sign.nameEn: exceeds established standards for daily caloric/fluid intake

sign.name: 與年齡不合的進食餐數
無法遵從營養建議
sign.nameEn: does not follow recommended nutrition plan

sign.name: 睡眠/休息模式擾亂家庭
與年齡與身體狀況睡眠不足
不適當/不​​持續的運動模式
不適合現在體能狀況的運動型態或運動量
sign.nameEn: inappropriate type/amount of exercise for age/physical condition

sign.name: 難以刷牙/使用牙線/口腔護理
不情願/無法/忘記完成自我照護
sign.nameEn: unwilling/unable/forgets to complete personal care activities

sign.name: 使用娛樂性藥物(幻覺劑、興奮劑、抗憂鬱劑)
育兒知識不足/不恰當
sign.nameEn: inappropriate/insufficient knowledge about family planning methods

sign.name: 健康行為的知識不足/不恰當
sign.nameEn: inappropriate/insufficient knowledge about preconception health practices

sign.name: inaccurate/inconsistent use of family planning methods
sign.nameEn: inaccurate/inconsistent use of family planning methods

sign.name: 對目前家庭計畫進行方式不滿
sign.nameEn: dissatisfied with present family planning method

sign.name: 擔心他人對家庭計畫選擇的反應
sign.nameEn: fears others' reactions regarding family planning choices

sign.name: 未能獲得常規/預防性的健康照護
sign.nameEn: fails to obtain routine/preventive health care

sign.name: 未能尋求徵狀的評估與治療
sign.nameEn: fails to seek care for symptoms requiring evaluation/treatment

sign.name: 未能依照照護人員要求回診
sign.nameEn: fails to return as requested to health care provider

sign.name: 無法配合不同專業的治療計畫
sign.nameEn: inability to coordinate multiple appointments/treatment plans

sign.name: 健康照護資源來源不一致
難以遵循服藥劑量與時間
出現藥物副作用/不良反應
出現藥物副作用/不良反應
無他人協助無法服藥
sign.nameEn: unable to take medications without help
